mapper.select: SELECT sq.QUESTION_SEQ, sq.QUESTION_NAME, sq.QUESTION_NUM, sq.QUESTION_FLAG_SEQ, sq.SURVEY_SEQ FROM SM_SURVEY ss INNER JOIN SM_QUESTION sq ON sq.SURVEY_SEQ = ss.SURVEY_SEQ WHERE sq.SURVEY_SEQ= #{SURVEY_SEQ} GROUP BY sq.QUESTION_NUM

SELECT sqv.VIEW_SEQ, sqv.VIEW_NAME, sqv.QUESTION_SEQ, sqv.VIEW_NUM FROM SM_QUESTION sq INNER JOIN SM_QUESTIONRVIEW sqv ON sq.QUESTION_SEQ = sqv.QUESTION_SEQ WHERE sqv.QUESTION_SEQ = #{QUESTION_SEQ} GROUP BY sqv.VIEW_NUM
select sc.COURSE_SEQ,sc.COURSE_NAME,sc.ORGANIZATION_SEQ,so.ORGANIZATION_NAME from SM_COURSE sc INNER JOIN SM_ORGANIZATION so ON so.ORGANIZATION_SEQ = sc.ORGANIZATION_SEQ WHERE 1=1;

select ss.SURVEY_NAME, s.SURVEY_SEQ from SM_SURVEY ss inner join (select SURVEY_SEQ from SM_COURSEREXAM ssc where ssc.COURSE_SEQ = (select COURSE_SEQ from SM_MEMBER where MEMBER_EMAIL = #{MEMBER_EMAIL} )) s where ss.SURVEY_SEQ = s.SURVEY_SEQ;

select ORGANIZATION_SEQ, ORGANIZATION_NAME from SM_ORGANIZATION where ORGANIZATION_SEQ = (select ORGANIZATION_SEQ from SM_COURSE sc where sc.COURSE_SEQ = (select COURSE_SEQ from SM_MEMBER where MEMBER_EMAIL = #{MEMBER_EMAIL}));
select DISTINCT(SURVEY_SEQ), QUESTION_SEQ from SM_QUESTION where SURVEY_SEQ = #{SURVEY_SEQ}

SELECT sm.MEMBER_NAME,sm.MEMBER_EMAIL,ssr.* FROM SM_MEMBER sm INNER JOIN ( SELECT * FROM SM_SURVEY_RESPONSE WHERE QUESTION_SEQ = #{QUESTION_SEQ} and SURVEY_SEQ = #{SURVEY_SEQ}) ssr ON ssr.COURSE_SEQ = sm.COURSE_SEQ WHERE sm.MEMBER_SEQ = ssr.MEMBER_SEQ;

SELECT sq.QUESTION_SEQ, sq.QUESTION_NAME, sq.QUESTION_NUM, sq.QUESTION_FLAG_SEQ, sq.SURVEY_SEQ FROM SM_SURVEY ss INNER JOIN SM_QUESTION sq ON sq.SURVEY_SEQ = ss.SURVEY_SEQ WHERE sq.SURVEY_SEQ= #{SURVEY_SEQ} and sq.QUESTION_FLAG_SEQ ='UUID_8002' or sq.QUESTION_FLAG_SEQ ='UUID_8003' GROUP BY sq.QUESTION_NUM
